content.detailedDescription: I was in stockton, ca. with some others and 3 of us were standing by the dark lit street when one friend said he was going to go in to use the bathroom and the other person went to get some water and was going to bring me some upon return and just after they had went in, something caught my eye in the night sky. what i saw were 2 round objects that were not horizontal, but on edge spinning counter clockwise and the colors that were being put off were creating a strange pattern kinda like when you spin a bicycle wheel and it creates a pattern that was consistent and the color(s) was red and black. the black may have been the night sky behind whatever the 2 objects were that i was watching. after maybe 30 seconds, i pulled out my new galexcy s5, hit the camera icon and then hit the video icon and i began to describe what i was seeing. i wasn't sure if it was filming or not, but i was talking out loud and just holding the phone at the angle i thought would catch these objects. both objects were slowly moving across the night sky heading in an easterly direction, zig zagging back and forth around eachother and then the stopped and hovered for a moment then the objects resumed there path easterly continuing to zig zag, go up and down back and fourth in ways far beyond our technology.  they then we're beginning to get farther away when all of a sudden they both made a hard right as to avoid hitting something and out from behind them came a satellite going north. it's like they had to turn to avoid hitting the satellite and they were now heading in a south easterly direction and disappeared into the distance. you can hear my audio from the phone recording, but i can't see the objects that i hoped to capture. these objects might be able to be seen with the right technology if someone knows how to either lighten up the video or look into the darkness of the video. i stopped filming just before they made an abrupt right turn as i was just in awe as to what i was seeing. i would have to say that i have not seen any technology or aircraft that we as humans may be able to create. these objects appeared to be pretty big and i really want to see what's in my video again as this was probably a once in a lifting experience.. i really hope mufon can help me with this technology to find out what these objects are in my video.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: To see not just one but 2 possible ufo"s was an amazing experience.

content.detailedDescription: I was asleep on the morning of oct. 3 and as awakened by a loud sound that sounded similar to a very low flyingtt airtctraft.  i live several miles away from harrisburg international airporo  but the planes coming and going from there typically follow a northwest totraveling  southeast route from the airport or vice versa.  this aircraft was extremely low and emitted a differ sound from what i hear from most aircraft.  it was more of a loud humming sound. the aircraft sounded that low that i truly thought it was going to crash into my house and another thing i noted is that it seemed to move so slowly.  i wish i would have gotten up to look out my window but i didn't.  this happened at 12:55 am.  around 2:00 pm, i got up to use the bathroom and when i walked out of my bedroom, i noticed a flash of light and i turned and looked into my living room.  there is a picture window in the living room and i could also see out of my dining room windows.  i looked across the living room and there were numerous bright flashes of light that completely covered the window on the east side of the living room.  i would estimate these flashes lasted around fifteen to thirty seconds and they were very bright and there was no sound emitting from them.  the best description i can give is that they were bright white to silver flashes.  i recall standing there watching what was happening and i had no clue whatsoever as to what was going on.  i remember looking towards my picture window and my dining room window and there was nothing there.  after this all happened, i went back to bed and i just laid there trying to understand what had just happened.  the next day, i called a neighbor who lives about a quarter mile down the road and he said he saw and heard nothing.  i've seen many strange things during my lifetime but never anything close to what i saw that morning.  it wasn't until the day after it happened that i started to associate the aircraft incident with the lights and that's when i decided to contact someone to find out if anything like this has ever been reported before.  please tell me i'm not crazy.  sorry, i just went up to the beginning of my report and tried t add some comments but for some reason, it just messed up my statementi hope you can offer some explanation for this totally bizarre incident.  thank you.
content.summary: Awakened by loud humming sound, 1 hr. later has numerous bright flashes in my living room window

content.detailedDescription: Please see video
content.summary: Glowing bright object moving from ne to e but rising

content.detailedDescription: my brother told about this event today. last night, he & his wife witnessed a ufo.I told him he should report it but he was not interested.I wanted to let someone know.They were traveling east & seen a few people standing in the street pointing up. he seen the object traveling from south to north. it was triangular in shape with blue, glowing, perimeters & 5-6 orange lights on the bottom. he said the object was as big as a few houses combined. they pulled over to get a better look & it disappeared.
content.summary: Very large, triangular object sighted moving from south to north. 5-6 orange lights on bottom & perimeter blue light. object disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: Last night i witnessed a light that at first i mistook for a star until it started flashing and then hovering. i watched for almost 20 minutes until it started to move towards the north west and behind the trees where it had been hovering over. today i decided to snap some pictures of the sky with m tablet. i couldn't see what i was photographing since it was somewhat bright out, but once i came in and zoomed into quite a few of the pictures i noticed these black spots near the clouds that broke around the sun. there are also some spots scattered in other areas as well. they were not visible until i zoomed in close.
content.summary: Black spots found when zoomed into light

content.detailedDescription: A friend of mine and i decided to go outside work to watch the rocket launch that was taking satellites to space. it was being launched out of virginia. we figured correctly that we should be able to see it. during the launch as the rocket was ascending, something caught my eye from the left. we were facing east, so this was north of me. i looked over and saw three giant lights in a triangle formation, moving very slowly and silently. it was dark so all i could see were the lights. i tapped my friends arm and pointed to it. it appeared to be no more than 1000 feet off the ground and huge. it moved very slowly and took over a minute before it was out of sight beyond the tree line. we both noted that there was absolutely no sound coming from it. we both figured it was some kind of unknown government aircraft. i did make a post on my facebook page about our sighting, but nothing else. currently i'm watching a show called ufo hunters, episode, great triangles, and realized they were describing exactly what we saw. this is what prompted me to contact your organization. with a little digging into my fb account, or reference the satellite launch you should be able to figure out the time and date it happened. i believe it was in october of 2013, and if i remember correctly the rocket had 29 satellites on board.
content.summary: It happened during a rocket launch with satellites aboard. rocket was launched from virginia.

content.detailedDescription: I was at home taking the dogs outside in the backyard.It was a beautiful summer starlit night.I walked to the back of the property where my shed and the tree line are located,i felt like i was being watched.As i looked up just above the tree line i observed a silent, massive ,gun metal black ,triangle shaped craft hovering from just above the tree line. it was moving very slowly to the north its now  over the top of me know it's blotting out the stars in my field of view above me. at that second a thought ran through my brain this is the real deal u.F.O. and just like that it shot straight up into the sky no sound, nor movement of the trees. this is when the lights came on green, white and red kinda like strobe or spin hard to tell as it climbed a mile or two perhaps into the sky had i blinked i would have lost track of it. it stopped this solid reddish orange fire ball dropped out from below the main object and just like that at atom splitting speed at the same exact fraction of a second the main craft shot north in a straight line and the fire ball shot straight opposite direction at this point i lost site of both objects. i was stunned. i noticed the dogs were already in the house i went in the house and told the family i saw a real life, live u.F.O. . my son, brandon ,approx age 8 at the time,said i want to see it dad. i responded its long gone son there is nothing to see it split,literally .
content.summary: Triangle

content.detailedDescription: While i was taking some pictures with my wife of the blood moon i caught an object that looked like a star going at a very fast speed.It did not look like a plane and did not have blinking lights of any kind. object was gone within seconds.I was using a canon power shot sx40 hs camera.
content.summary: Taking picture of blood moon

content.detailedDescription: I was recording my cat when i heard geese flying over. i didn't see anything until later when i was watching the recording. it made such odd movements and it reflected sunlight so my immediate thought went to ufo. you have to watch it frame by frame or in slow motion to really see it.  it appears around the 10 second mark. would love to know what you think it could be. thanks!
content.summary: Object came from the right, went straight up in the air, then went down and back up.

content.detailedDescription: On labor day weekend in 1995 three if us, myself, girlfriend,and other friend decided to go from phoenix to the tip of the baja gulf....Puerto penasco. we left in the morning, and arrived at about noon. we were surprised to see a throng of dune buggies, sand rails, and the likes were there for some kind of event. we stayed on the beach having a good time. later that night my friends got tired and went to sleep in the suv of my girlfriends. i decided to just go ahead and drive back to phoenix. in the darkness if the desert i accidentally made a wrong turn, and wound up heading towards tijuana. some time passed, and i remember looking across the desert seeing a light of a ranch house. there's thing i remember is a bright light over the passengers side of the car. i mean a blinding white light. i was stopped. i couldn't move, but remember trying not to laugh. it sounds weird. these " midgets" as i have told the story came around the car. i rolled down the window as one came to the window of the car. my friends didn't wake. it was dark out. desolate. the next thing i was on the outskirts of tijuana, and the sun was up. i woke my friends, and they were angry at me for going the wrong way. i've looked on maps, and you must go through mexicali to get to tijuana on that road. i never have been through,around, anywhere near mexicali. i have recently told thus story to my mother. i've been keeping it to myself all these years because of doubters. including myself. each time i close my eyes i get a knot in my stomach. i know what i saw. i know it was real. i've never been the same since.
content.summary: Driving from puertp penasco to phoenix. craft apppeared. came to sun coming up. in another place.

content.detailedDescription: My family, mom, step-dad, cousin, my daughter, myself were coming home from having dinner around 8 pm in october 2002-2003. we live in the country, the driveway to our house is a mile long with woods on both sides of the road. it had been raining  all afternoon. we were driving down the driveway,rain pouring down, poped over the little hill and seen over to the left right in the tree line a bright fireball bought the only way i can explain it.  it was red,orage,yellow glowing,it looked to be about 1-2 foot of the ground hovering in one spot.  we all saw it, we all were like what is that at first i said someone must have started a fire, but then who would do that considering it had been raining  most the day heavy rain  for a couple of hours and it was  my property. i know  i felt  scared i had my cousin stay the night with me, there was no way i was staying home  alone. the last thing of that night i remember  is getting out of the truck running to  my house locking the door. everyone in the truck was confused  at what we were seeing.  the next day my step-dad  and cousin went to check out the spot were we saw it, they said that they didn't  see anything not even a burnt place if someone had started a fire . that's my story to this day i still am trying to figure out what  we saw that night.
content.summary: My mom step dad cousin daughter and myself came over a hill coming home off to the left we saw a red yellow glowing ball of fire hovering in the tree line

content.detailedDescription:
My wife, son, and i were walking home after a short walk through our neighborhood. my wife exclaimed, "did you see that?". i said "no", but began to fixate my eyes in the direction she had mentioned. suddenly a sphere of light brighter then all stars appeared and disappeared. this object would brighten and disappear slowly and on separate occasions very fast, brighten and disappear. also, this object would reappear in different locations giving the impression that it had moved.

we hurried home and i asked my father and step son to try to observe what we saw.  they only had to wait a few minutes to observe the exact same thing.  all four of us saw the light do what i explained above. the last time i saw it that night, the light appeared directly over head at least 3 times and did not move while appearing and disappearing.

i was a physics major at the university near my home.  i have a good understanding of acceleration (pertaining to change in direction and velocity) and a good general understanding of how satellites and meteorites behave. stopping and changing direction does not happen and would be catastrophic for a satellite though this could be a highly reflective science experiment i suppose. in my opinion this was not farther away then the moon but did not seem to be within our atmosphere either.

also i found a video on mfoon's last 20 sighting reports page that matched exactly what i experienced.  the case number is for that observation is 71265.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Sphere of light brighter then all stars that would brighten and disappear slowly then very fast. this object moved and stopped directly overhead

content.detailedDescription: Just past sunset i turned to watch the mountains & saw above the darkened mountains saw a what may have been an extremely large grey cigar shaped object with grey smoke all around it except in the front. the smoke seemed to be traveling with it. it moved exceptionally fast & when it finally went just below the darkened mountain skyline, i could no longer see it. i alerted my husband but he has poor eyesight & was unable to see it as it was traveling too fast for him to catch sight of it. it appeared to be on our side of the mountains & was difficult to tell how far away it was except it looked to be several miles away which makes me feel it must have been gigantic. my feeling was that i was stunned to see this unknown object & actually be able to make out a clear outline of this extremely fast moving object. i was shocked!
content.summary: Elongated disc seemed to emit dull grey smoke all around it except in front, & was traveling extremely fast!! may have been huge!!

content.detailedDescription: October 4 2015 i was barbecuing in our backyard in a mobile home park with my boyfriend.  we were sitting on the backstep when we heard a swishing sound above us. we heard the sound and i stood up stepped of the porch were we were sitting,  directly above us was a very large black object, it made nearly no noise,  it seem to have some kind of white "reflect " stripes under it. it was enormous and i really was shaking and just couldn't believe what i saw. it flew extremely low and had no lights or sound. by the time i got to the front it was e in the darkness.  i honestly just sat quietly and it has been bothering me so i have to tell someone, i did share it with my friend,  i have lived in antelope valley for over 25 years and have seen many things fly, " stealth) pretty common but never anything like this. please ease my mind.
content.summary: I was sitting on backstop heard a swishing sound then 3-4 seconds later a extremely large object flew directly above me i could have thrown a rock and hit it. my finance and i watched in amazement.

content.detailedDescription: Was sky gazing when a bright light caught my eye -when i looked in that direction, nothing, continued to look up and then it lit up, then disappeared again. this continued for a while, all in the same area of the sky. call ed my wife, and then she seen it as well. i went into the house to grab my iphone to see if i could capture it on video. got about 3 captures on the video. at first i thought maybe a satellite catching the sun, but it really didn't move from a patch of sky. then it just stopped.
content.summary: Bright light just lit up and then disappeared just to do it again

content.detailedDescription:
Due to all these sightings  i will try to sumerise.

i view these sightings  with a 70 mm telescope.  i have kept a
notebook of each sighting.  most are round shaped with with light around the 

edges.  the last ones have blue sparkly light around the edges.
content.summary: As of last night  !0-7-2015  i have seen 307 sightings     these started 8-4-14

content.detailedDescription: I live in the area some call the bridgewater triangle,i have been watching the sky for many years as a hobby. i take many pictures of the white lines that the planes leave. while doing yard work and taking care of a small farm i look up and take pictures as i see fit. i have collected many strange things in the sky around sun set. most of these pictures are facing northwest. sometimes an object will catch my eye and i snap a picture, other time i just take several pictures and see things in them that i could not see with my eyes. i have some pictures to go with this story, as i said they are always in the same area facing northwest. friends told me about this site a said i should send you my pictures. friends believe that its because i am in the middle of the bridgewater triangle, i'm not sure about that but that area is very busy with strange things.
content.summary: Several different objects on different nights

content.detailedDescription:
1 i was at home in the nursery room giving milk to my son, this is the only window facing south south east i couldn't get a better video then i have.

2 it is the third or fourth time we see it one time we pulled out the telescope we saw line and shape cutting across that you cannot see in my video also it took a distinctive losange shape that i could not record. it is an orb that changes colours vibrates and blinks

3 we saw it from downtown toronto same position south south east 65 degrees 

4 nothing special i tried to zoom in to see it better but it grows and then disappear each time and then with my zoom at times fifty i cannot find it back in the sky , when i zoom you hear it in the video, the video 36 i do not zoom so you can see it grows and then disappear and then reappears somewhere else

motion: stationary
short abrupt left right up or down 
2 to 3 movements
stops moving change colours 
grows expand expand 
nearly transparent
disappear
reappear small blinking ten degrees afar in the sky 

5 i only lose sight because i give up watching    

i am only going to attach the minimum coz it is not loading contact me if you want 5 videos and 15 pictures
content.summary: Its the disco ball its not a star it flashes change colours moves sporadically and extremely fast

content.detailedDescription:
Same scenario and objects as observed 24 hours before (reference report case number 71229 submitted on 10/07/2015).  lights appeared in a cluster in western sky then, one by one moved northward and then southward over our position.  

it is possible that objects were drones operated from either of two nearby locations:

1. martin state airport (site of maryland air national guard unit).

2. aberdeen proving ground (located northeast of this location).  objects were noted to be traveling south, not north.

if they were drones however, that doesn't explain the sudden appearance of objects as they joined the cluster before moving northward.  that's the mysterious part of these observations.

all of the objects moved very slowly and were very quiet when passing overhead, much quieter than even a small private single-engine aircraft.  this location is nearby frequent flybys of military aircraft which are unmistakable by their very loud noise and physical profile. 

witnesses were my wife chris and myself as identified in the previous case report.
content.summary: Objects appeared then moved northward then southward

content.detailedDescription: I was getting into my truck to leave for work in the morning. it was a clear morning and i looked up into the sky and saw the moon then noticed something flying by really fast by the moon. it then stopped for a second, changed directions and vanished.
content.summary: Flying object that change directions and vanished

content.detailedDescription: It was 10:30 at night i had stepped out on my third story balcony for a smoke. i had seen clouds to the south of me and i had seen lightening in them which is odd for october to me. then in the clear part of the sky i had seen what i thought was a satellite moving from the southeast to the west moving at a pretty good speed. as i was watching, it has flown in a z pattern quickly then had stopped in the sky. as my eyes focused on the object i could see the outline was in a black saucer shape and it had blue and green exterior lights that had pulsated. as i had looked onward a transparent cloud had went under it but i still could see it because my eyes were fixed on it. as the cloud had blew by i could see it dim its lights and blend in the night sky except for one dim light. then i could see the dim light move around in an aimless flight pattern before it had shot off southward in the night sky. it was weird that as i was looking at it i felt i was in a stand off. also when i had observed it while the lights were visible and it was hovering i felt dizzy for a few seconds. like a magnetic wave had went over me.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Starlike object in the sky that changed flight pattern quickly then hovered in sky

content.detailedDescription:
1. standing near intersection of peppertree lane  and woodbrook lane in fallbrook. observing to the west for vandenburg rocket launch at 5:55 am.

2. observe rocket for several seconds in wsw at about 45 degrees up in sky. the rocket disappeared and i noticed 3 lights, triangular, looking like 3rd magnitude stars moving slowly from west to east. they were maybe 40 degrees up and to my ssw. 

3. the object moved very slowly and had no blinking lights. i thought is was a triangular ufo i had seen pictures of.

4. the object in binoculars still appeared as lights looking like stars. as it moved east the 3 stars spread out to a front star and a small triangle trailing behind it about 1.5 moon diameters apart. it moved slowly for about 4 minutes then became dimmer. i lost it after it went behind a tree nearby.

5. the object did not move or look like ans aircraft, too slow. the appearance came at the same time the vandenburg rocket launch was occurring. i called my brother on the phone who also saw it from his location about 1 mile south of my location.

6. the object just became dimmer and lower in the sky until i could not see it any more.
content.summary: Observing vandenburg rocket launch from fallbrook, ca saw triangle of lights in sky.

content.detailedDescription: So this is the 3rd sighting of this kind, 3 nights in a row..Second report...We were n our back deck..I looked at the time when this happened..It was about 8:35..Its when we are usually out..We were actually able to take a picture of when it glowed. (the date/time stamp is wrong on my husbands camera, the pictures were taken last night 10/7/2015) this object appears out of no where. it does not fly across and stop and start glowing. we are looking at a certain spot or cluster of stars and then it seems like a star just glows bright,like its been there the whole time, again like someone turned on a lightbulb. when it goes off you can still see it slightly. i actually got my 15 yr old son to see it also. it looks like a star and then just glows orange and goes off. its a fluid glow, not a quick burst when it glows, but then sometimes there will be a flash that's brighter. it seems to respond when were taking pictures, because of the flash with the camera....It flashes back. theres no noise..Plenty of planes around. the second night it happened it was northwest...Last night it was northeast when we got the pictures. it seems to hover in that area..Drifting slightly to the right and then it just goes away.
content.summary: Glowing light and flashes of light

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my back patio having coffee when i saw this object yet again like i saw three months ago just slowly gliding across the sky.It was going way t slow for it to be an airplane,and then it just disappeared.My feelings on seeing this object once again was what is going on here in jupiter florida?
content.summary: It was an oval object that was ike transparent but you could see it just gliding very slowly across the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
London
every morning me and my friend check the sky as recently it has been red so were intrigued. today the sky was purple more than red so i called her to let her know and see if she could see. i was looking up all of a sudden an object was descending from the sky like a plane but smaller and going in a strange direction i took pictures then another appeared then two at the same time then more and more just kept on coming two looked like they was going to crash but one changed it sort of swerved they all headed in the same direction behind the trees where the sun was rising all heading that way  some reflected the sun on one side as you can see in the pictures. once i looked back on the pics i noticed a purple blob in quite a few pics but that could be lense issues i'm not an expert i don't know what it is but i couldn't see it in the pictures when i was taking them i said at one point it looks like debris scattering and falling from the sky but what could be so big it breaks apart n leaves smoke like trails behind it some had two trails which just disappeared i'm not sure what it is but you guys sure will hopefully. my children also witnessed this ok they are 8 and 9 but my son calle me into his room as he could see one i ran in n he was right there was a bigger one. look i know you must have these all the time but i wouldn't be here doing this if i didn't see this n experience what i did this morning.
content.summary: This morning i witnessed strange objects falling from the sky leaving trails behind all diving down towards the sunrise

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog across the street from my house at approximately 10:20 pm, mtn time. i was watching the sky looking for satellites and meteors when i noticed a bright flash of light between 2 stars. it flashed in the same position several times anywhere from 5 to 30 second intervals. it remained in the same position for 2 to 3 minutes. then it started to move slowly to the east, again flashing in intervals with no consistency.I decided at this point to go back to the house to get my wife and stepson and see if it would still be there when i returned with them. it had moved to a in an eastward direction to where it was almost directly overhead.My wife and stepson both observed the white flash in the sky several times as it changed direction and started to move in a southerly direction. we watched it flash intermittently for a few more minutes then hadn't return to the house to go to bed. i frequently observe satellites overhead and the move at a much more rapid pace than this object moved. there were jets in the sky at the same time so we could differentiate between them and the object. there were also several meteors near the object so we could tell it seemed to be at an altitude comparable to satellites. i wasn't sure if it could be a satellite making controlled burns to change course or what but was really strange to see it maintain a steady position for as long as it did.I knew i needed to get witnesses to confirm that i  was seeing what i was seeing and thankfully my wife and stepson were able to see it as well.We all returned to the house at 10:36 pm.
content.summary: Bright randomly flashing light in western sky seemed to be stationary then moved eastward slowly then changed to a southerly direction

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I usually go out at night to watch for stuff in the sky. i sit my chair up and keep my eyes toward the night sky. i have never seen anything more than airplanes and shooting stars. i live near an airport, so at night i always make sure not to confuse airplanes with other things.

on october 5 2015 i was sitting in my chair outside rocked back and was looking in the sky. what caught my eye was something moving in the sky. it was silent. it was larger than a quarter from my viewpoint, but not larger than a silver dollar. it was not bright. it had no bright lights. it had no blinking lights. it was like a dark red and almost seemed translucent. the sighting lasted no more than 10 seconds as it was travelling. it came from the north, i got out of my chair to watch it overheard and it made a right angle turn that was about 3-4 inches from my view and continued straight south. it made no sound and i was able to visually watch it from the second i saw it till it flew slightly overhead, and out of sight.
content.summary: Transluscent looking dark red object with no sound. flew straight path n-s made 45 degree turn west abruptly then continued south.

content.detailedDescription:
I was near my house walking our dog and sky watching.
at about 9pm i saw a bright white flicker, brighter than a bright star.Thought maybe a plane since airport near, but no it was a bright point of light.
it was almost directly overhead comming southwest headed north. i continued to watch but saw nothing, it was only a bright flash of light not like planes. eventually after a flash. i lost track of it. another flash from the east happened and i tracked that sphere like a satellite except would get brighter, like a bright star, as it traveled and then dimmer and smaller almost not visible and this would repeat as it moved on a straight path westward. at first thought maybe a satellite but they a small and dim.
the brightness varied as if its light was constant but it distance was comming lower than farther. i stopped tracking it after a minute or so. had to get in for the night.
content.summary: About 9pm spotted a flicker of light saw an orb that flashed bright then nothing for several seconds and again.

content.detailedDescription:
I was recording with my iphone some blackhawk helicopters flying over my house at t/p/o and was gust reviewing the video i realized it was in slow motion and saw an object move from the bottom right to the left a lot faster than the helicopters even though they were both in slow motion.Not sure if it could be a bird but you guys are the experts let me know what you think
if i can't figure out how to attach it to this form i will email seperatly
i am a retired new york city police officer living in west texas
content.summary: Unknown object flying faster than the helicopters in slow motion

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i where coming home from high school in june of 1977. we where both seniors it was around 11:30 am we started to come down the hill in our village ( wappingers falls n.Y.) to our right was the library beautiful building very old and there it was the jupiter 2 from lost in space,we started flipping out and then it started to move the same way we where going we stayed with it for only a short time and then lost it. we looked at each other and said don't bother to tell anyone they won't believe us. i'm 57 years old and never told anyone,it's been 22 years since i seen my friend,we new each other since the 6 grade we where best friends we went to all our proms togethere he married his high school sweetheart. well that's our story.
content.summary: On our way home from school summer and there it was over a building.
